Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres and faded white tendril; exterior: dot and billet pattern at rim above stopt maeander band between lines; below, dot and billet pattern, with trace of curved line below.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 262, no. 533)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0463) (phase 2)
